ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings brothers, We need an all monk guild spanning many servers... do we have to have 10 on each server to start with .... I can think of 7 or 8 on
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings brothers,

We need an all monk guild spanning many servers... do
we have to have 10 on each server to start with .... I
can think of 7 or 8 on Bertoxxulous that may be
willing to join a brotherhood of fellow monks... as
has been said earlier we have to stick together...

I wish you all well,

Lenyong,
Bert Server

===

Skye Rarius Aria
Tower Keeper
Scarlet_Caste_Tower on Dalnet
